name: Diamond Splash - The Hardest Jewel Chain Reaction Game Ever
name_original: Diamond Splash - The Hardest Jewel Chain Reaction Game Ever
description:
The long awaited Version 2.0 is here! We promised you new levels like you asked for. We also decided to do something more.

* Upgrade your Diamond Traps. Now you can enhance the performance of your Diamond Traps to make them more powerful than ever!
* Black Gem Dodge mode. Don't get hit by the Black Gems in this brand new game mode!
* Survival mode. Stay alive for as long as you can in this new time based game mode!
* Play through 9 Level Packs. Don't get too comfortable if the early levels seem easy!
* Super Diamonds Power Ups. Now you can pick up a powerful Super Diamond during gameplay to increase your Diamond Trap radius!
* New ways to earn FREE coins used to Upgrade Your Diamond Traps!
* And much, much more.



Tap the flying diamonds to splash them out and make them connect with as many other diamonds as you possibly can. Diamond Splash takes the Puzzle genre to new heights!

Each level adds more and more diamonds to splash - it's madness!

Try the different level packs for fun, creative obstacles and challenges that really test your skills!


!!! Download Diamond Splash TODAY While It's FREE !!!
